mapper.insert: INSERT INTO img_album (name, description, cover_image_id, owner_id, access_level) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{coverImageId}, #{ownerId}, #{accessLevel})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM img_album ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE img_album SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, cover_image_id = #{coverImageId}, updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO img_album_image (album_id, image_id, sort_order) VALUES (#{albumId}, #{imageId}, #{sortOrder})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM img_album_image WHERE album_id = #{albumId} AND image_id = #{imageId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM img_album_image WHERE album_id = #{albumId}
mapper.update: UPDATE img_album SET image_count = image_count + 1, updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE id = #{albumId}
